panels.title: 下游成功率（非 5xx 响应）
上游成功率（非 5xx 响应）

panels.description: 每秒钟生成或使用的令牌数量，常用于衡量限流系统的配额情况。
panels.title: Token消耗速率（每秒）
每秒输入 Token 数（模型级）
每秒输出 Token 数（模型级）
首 Token 延迟（模型级）

panels.description: 不同消费者对服务的使用情况统计，可用于监控哪些用户/客户端调用量最大、消耗 Token 最多等。
panels.title: 调用方使用统计

panels.description: 显示网格中 Envoy 代理的详细信息
panels.title: Envoy 详情

panels.description: Envoy 向控制面发起 XDS 请求时所发送的数据大小（例如请求中携带的元数据或节点信息等）
panels.title: XDS 请求大小

targets.expr: label_replace(label_replace(topk(10, sum(irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_total{higress="$gateway", cluster_name!="xds-grpc", cluster_name!="prometheus_stats", cluster_name!="agent", cluster_name!="BlackHoleCluster", cluster_name!="sds-grpc"}[5m])) by (cluster_name)), "service", "$3", "cluster_name", "outbound_([0-9]+)_(.*)_(.*)$"), "port", "$1", "cluster_name", "outbound_([0-9]+)_(.*)_(.*)$")

label_replace(label_replace(topk(10, sum(irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq{response_code_class=~"(4|5)xx",higress="$gateway", cluster_name!="xds-grpc", cluster_name!="prometheus_stats", cluster_name!="agent", cluster_name!="BlackHoleCluster", cluster_name!="sds-grpc"}[5m])) by (cluster_name)), "service", "$3", "cluster_name", "outbound_([0-9]+)_(.*)_(.*)$"), "port", "$1", "cluster_name", "outbound_([0-9]+)_(.*)_(.*)$")

label_replace(label_replace(topk(10, sum(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_active{higress="$gateway", cluster_name!="xds-grpc", cluster_name!="prometheus_stats", cluster_name!="agent", cluster_name!="BlackHoleCluster", cluster_name!="sds-grpc"}) by (cluster_name)), "service", "$3", "cluster_name", "outbound_([0-9]+)_(.*)_(.*)$"), "port", "$1", "cluster_name", "outbound_([0-9]+)_(.*)_(.*)$")

label_replace(label_replace(topk(10, sum(irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_time_sum{higress="$gateway", cluster_name!="xds-grpc", cluster_name!="prometheus_stats", cluster_name!="agent", cluster_name!="BlackHoleCluster", cluster_name!="sds-grpc"}[5m])) by (cluster_name) / sum(irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_time_count{higress="$gateway",cluster_name!="xds-grpc", cluster_name!="prometheus_stats", cluster_name!="agent", cluster_name!="BlackHoleCluster", cluster_name!="sds-grpc"}[5m])) by (cluster_name)), "service", "$3", "cluster_name", "outbound_([0-9]+)_(.*)_(.*)$"), "port", "$1", "cluster_name", "outbound_([0-9]+)_(.*)_(.*)$")
